attributes.action: Make energy infrastructure a key priority for government spending.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Changing consumption patterns (i.e. encouraging consumers to conserve energy and be less wasteful) may take several generations to become effective.  Oil and gas prices, however, are far quicker to react.  Everyone, without exception, should be able to heat their home, heat water and cook food without worrying how they can afford to do so.  The UK must invest in infrastructure, not simply provide concessions to those most in need.
